text: Manoella Torres (born April 21, 1954) is an American singer and actress of Puerto Rican descent. Her career is based in Mexico City. She has recorded over 350 songs by famous songwriters including Armando Manzanero, Juan Carlos Calderón, Juan Gabriel, Manuel Alejandro, Felicia Garza and Rafael Pérez Botija. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from New York City Category:Singers from Mexico City
title: Manoella Torres
